string.name: box_browsesdk_title
string.description: Default title for the Browse SDK

string.name: box_browsesdk_cannot_view_folder
string.description: Error message shown when the user does not have sufficient permissions to view the items in the folder or it is not available

resources.string: You cannot view the items in this folder.

string.name: box_browsesdk_network_error
string.description: Toast message that indicates that an error occurred while performing an action

string.name: box_browsesdk_session_is_not_authenticated
string.description: Toast message that indicates that the provided authentication session is not valid

string.name: box_browsesdk_no_item_selected
string.description: Toast message that indicates that an invalid item was provided to browse on

string.name: box_browsesdk_all_files
string.description: Title shown for the parent folder when it is at the root level

string.name: box_browsesdk_action_settings
string.description: Accessibility title for the settings menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_action_search
string.description: Accessibility title for the search menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_create_folder
string.description: Accessibility title for the create folder menu action in the toolbar

string.name: box_browsesdk_select_folder
string.description: Button text shown at the bottom of the activity to allow the user to select the current folder as the folder that should be returned

resources.string: A folder with that name has already been created.

string.name: search_hint
string.description: hint text for Search View. Argument represents a folder name

string.name: default_search_hint
string.description: Default hint text for Search View

string.name: filter_results_header
string.description: Label for button that launches screen to filter search results

string.name: filter_search_results
string.description: Header text for refine search results activity

string.name: apply
string.description: label for apply button in refine search results activity

string.name: clear_filters
string.description: label for clear filters button in refine search results activity

string.name: file_type_label
string.description: Header for section that let you select file types to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_pdf
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_spreadsheet
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_presentation
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_image
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_folder
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_document
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_boxnote
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_video
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_audio
string.description: File type to search for

string.name: search_filter_file_type_see_more
string.desctiption: Hyperlink to show hidden file types

string.name: date_modified_label
string.description: Header for section that limit search based on last modified date of the files and folders

string.name: any_time
string.description: Label for setting to search for files modified at any time

string.name: past_day
string.description: Label for setting to search for files modified in last day

string.name: past_week
string.description: Label for setting to search for files modified in last week

string.name: past_month
string.description: Label for setting to search for files modified in last month

string.name: past_year
string.description: Label for setting to search for files modified in last year

string.name: item_size_label
string.description: Header for section that limit search based on size of the files and folders

string.name: item_size_0_to_1
string.description: Label for setting to search for files with size in given range

string.name: item_size_1_to_5
string.description: Label for setting to search for files with size in given range

string.name: item_size_5_to_25
string.description: Label for setting to search for files with size in given range

string.name: item_size_25_to_100
string.description: Label for setting to search for files with size in given range

string.name: item_size_100_to_1000
string.description: Label for setting to search for files with size in given range

string.name: search_filter_label_delimiter
string.desctiption: If user has selected some search filters, we show the same as a string. This is the delimiter for the same. For example this may be shown as 'PDF, Image, Audio, Last Week, 1-5 MB'. ', ' is picked from this string as a delimiter
